name: Taverns & Trolls
blurb: Run a tavern on the edge of a portal into adventure. Recruit heroes, lead them into the portal, and fight to bring them home alive.

rewards.reward: No Reward
Commoner - Get access to all Kickstarter Rewards (see description), but you'll have to buy the game yourself.
Quickened Adventurer - For the early birds, get a copy of the game for $2 less! You will also get access to the closed beta and all Kickstarter rewards.
Adventurer - A copy of the game, as well as access to the closed beta and all Kickstarter rewards.

Quickened Illusionist - For the early birds, get a copy of the game for $2 less! A copy of the game, access to the closed beta, as well as all future vanity DLCs (see description for more details) and all Kickstarter rewards.
Illusionist - A copy of the game, access to the closed beta, as well as all future vanity DLCs (see description for more details) and Kickstarter rewards.

Quickened Ranger - For the early birds, get a copy of the game for $2 less! A copy of the game, access to the closed beta, and all future gameplay DLCs (see description for more details) and all Kickstarter rewards.
Ranger - A copy of the game, access to the closed beta, and all future gameplay DLCs (see description for more details) and all Kickstarter rewards.

Quickened Wizard - For the early birds, get a copy of the game for $2 less! A copy of the game, access to the closed beta, and all future vanity and gameplay DLCs (see description for more details), as well as all Kickstarter rewards.
Wizard - A copy of the game, access to the closed beta, and all future vanity and gameplay DLCs (see description for more details), as well as all Kickstarter rewards.

Quickened Adventurer Party - For the early birds, get 4 copies of the game for $5 less! You will also get access to the closed beta for all four. You will also receive a copy of the Kickstarter rewards for each member of the party.
Adventurer Party - Get a bundle of 4 copies of the game as save $5! All includes closed beta access to all four, and a copy of the Kickstarter rewards for each member of the party.

Quickened Illusionist Party - For the early birds, get 4 copies of the game for $5 off! You will also get beta access and all future vanity DLCs for each of the four people.  You will also receive a copy of the Kickstarter rewards for each member of the party.
Illusionist Party - Get a bundle of 4 copies of the game, beta access, and all vanity DLCs and save $10.  You will also receive a copy of the Kickstarter rewards for each member of the party.

Quickened Ranger Party - For the early birds, get 4 copies of the game for $5 off! You will also get beta access and all future gameplay DLCs for each of the four people.  You will also receive a copy of the Kickstarter rewards for each member of the party.
Ranger Party - Get a bundle of 4 copies of the game, beta access, and all gameplay DLCs and save $10. You will also receive a copy of the Kickstarter rewards for each member of the party.
Town Crier - Everything from the Wizard tier, plus the ability to submit a first name and last name combination to be included in the random name generator.

Quickened Wizard Party - For the early birds, get 4 copies of the game for an extra $10 off! You will also get beta access and all future DLCs for each of the four people. You will also receive a copy of the Kickstarter rewards for each member of the party.
Wizard Party - Get a bundle of 4 copies of the game, beta access, and all future DLCS and save $10!  You will also receive a copy of the Kickstarter rewards for each member of the party.
Artisan - We'll work with you to create a piece of art (such as a small painting or statue) that the players can find as part of their loot. You will also receive everything in the Wizard tier!
Blacksmith - Wizard tier rewards, plus we'll work with you to design a named weapon or armor for the game.
Archmage - Wizard tier rewards, plus we'll work with you to design a spell for the game.
Enchanter, You will get to design a spell and a named weapon or armor. This also includes everything from the Wizard tier!
Veteran - Everything from Wizard tier, plus we'll design a character from either a picture or description to appear in the tavern's main room.
King - Everything from Veteran, Town Crier, and Enchanter tiers (only one copy of Wizard tier rewards).
Monster Hunter - Everything from Wizard tier, plus we will work with you to design a race of enemies or a dungeon type for the game.
Emperor - Everything from the Monster Hunter and King tiers. (Only includes 1 copy of Kickstarter rewards)

Demigod - Wizard tier reward, plus we will design one of the major NPCs off of either a picture of you, or a description. Possibilities include shopkeepers, leaders of the major branches of the heroes, or other NPCs yet to be revealed!
God Emperor - Everything from Emperor tier, but with Demigod tier rewards instead of Veteran.
